strings.v:
Ah, this one is
a very rare item.
But the serious collector lives for the thrill of the hunt.
Enough with the flashback! You promised me a worthy opponent for this Contest!
Patience, my blue friend! It isn't yours...yet.

Welcome, Summoner!
You have been chosen to represent Earth in a cosmic
CONTEST OF CHAMPIONS against Kang the Conqueror!
I am The Collector, the organizer of this Contest.
The stakes are simple: win and you shall be granted UNTOLD POWER. Lose and you shall be placed in my collection... permanently!
